pages.body:
Dev Ideas
=======

- [proof of concept js application](/1AtRr9BPxKkPswG4uKn17bht2JCdv2cMqt/)

## Zite Concepts
- [Diaspora](https://diasporafoundation.org/) Alternative with Multi Platform Support.
- LEGAL Music Zite with a payment system similar to [Brave Payments](https://brave.com/faq-payments/#what-is-brave-payments)
- "Facebook"-like in development 
- "CMS" admin panel for ZeroBlog
- Music voting platform (similar to defunct PromoBay) Something that would allow zites to place a 'Jam-of-the-week / month' on their frontpage.
- Username carryover token file key export (to allow ease username / id preservation during migration)
- Mobile App Market
- Sort favorite sites into categories on ZeroHello front page
- A more traditional style forum engine akin to phpbb and vBulletin. (Threads are grouped into subforums, no likes/upvotes, BBCode instead of Markdown, etc.)
- A more customizable blog engine
- Option to only serve content from a zite to tor users for more mandatory user anonymity.
- Web of Trust system to facilitate content curation/filtering, search and marketplace trust
- Newsletters (GrowSurf-like)
- Comments (Disqus-like)
- Social gadgets (Profile/Like/Share-button, for ZeroMe/Peeper)
- Books (Wattpad-like, can be based on Zerobook with social features like ZeroMedium haves)
- Podcasting and Music platform dedicated to original content (suggestion by @krixano here)
- Good and Up to date News zites that aren't just mirrors of clearnet stuff (suggestion by @krixano here)
- Goodreads and Review zites (suggestion by @krixano here)
- Cryptocurrency assisted by Git (using commits as blocks in blockchain)
- Plugin that helps every peer help to crawl URLs for search engines
- Plugin for multiple site owners (using BTCADDRESS+BTCADDRESS or hash in the URL)
- eBazar bridge with plugin
- Zite listing actors, movies, series, TV shows, youtubers (IMDB-like)
- Music Lyrics/Cifras
- News aggregator (Google Newsstand-like)
- Translator, using open-source translator codes, converting C code using Emscripten, every language used as merger sites
- Feedback service, can be integrated with zites (Uservoice-like)
-  .exe downloads zite
-  Android .apk downloads zite
- Game ROMs and PC abandonware download zite (The ISO Zone-like)
- Pokemon fansite
- Calendar zite (integrated with ZeroMe's events)
- Contacts zite (integrated with ZeroMe)
- Zite to draw and post art/design images (Deviantart-like)
- Zite to create musics (Beatlab-like)
- Peertube compatible bridge (Peertube 1.0 is out)

## Games :
- Chess game
- Go/Weiqi/Baduk game
- NationStates like game

## Services :
- Age Restricting Site Blocker. A post about this here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1532992852_1JHx7fetxzMnUyQ5bUpNLAKAW9VEZdbFMa

## Other:
- CLI browser for ZeroNet
- Non-OOP alternative to ZeroFrame

**************************

## Old Zite Ideas that Devs have/are Creating:
- ZeroMaps: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1yUji4qPD7GAog8XkP3EDMEfrL995S4Xd
- Poll Zite: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1K28kQFMquNzto2iQf4GGjr6oFUbC1NddE
- ZMS, CMS for ZeroNet: http://127.0.0.1:43110/16WP9nHFDTX84yN4yy1hbWDUBwJzRwG8sX
- Messaging App ThunderWave: http://127.0.0.1:43110/thunderwave.bit/
- Street Market: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1SunbskVNZCJoYTG7iKh4F6LkaDRAsZxK/
- Kiwipedia, Wikipedia alternative: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KiwiBCVBUcuypVm8FEmUW9YT6fJDXkN9r/

**************************

See also ZeroDevTalk [App ideas list](/142jqssVAj2iRxMACJg2dzipB5oicZYz5w/?Topic:1516741810_1AnFGL613gYqFWm4Lhwdk6x5gCRe1tPFxE/App+ideas+list)

Thanks to Site of Interesting for many ideas: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BVGUB9cyZjUJJbRtQZmgS4YpZE1v8Nn1R/needed.html

Kiwipedia Mirror: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KiwiBCVBUcuypVm8FEmUW9YT6fJDXkN9r/?/imported/en/zerowiki-dev-ideas/dev-ideas

[[dev-resources]]

## Docs & References

1.  [ZeroNet Document](https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)

    Official doc hosted on readthedocs.io

    [[Github repo]](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/Documentation/)

    [[Unofficial clone on ZeroNet]](/1Docsfk5uLvuXkL4U13eYDxCm2gzi1fNQq/) #outdated

## Tutorials & Resources

1.  [ZeroChat tutorial new](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:99:ZeroChat+tutorial+new) #official #javascript
2.  [ZeroChat tutorial old](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:46:ZeroNet+site+development+tutorial+2) #offical #coffeescript
3.  [Zeronet Tutorials](/1Jtjb5CU9aod4jtz8hF5NPPqFKofRSsb4x/) #zerowiki #multisource
4.  [Tutorials on ZeroNet Dev Center](/14pM9huTYzJdyQyHRj6v2kfhMe8DrxwpGt/?/tutorials)
5.  [Kopi](/1KtzUsnmwc1Wr7KWWEGnWzmBSQoyH917Pz)

    Kopi is a ZeroNet boilerplate with all the necessary elements to start a new project without the need to configure and develop the same features again and again.
6. [Zeroframe on NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/zeroframe)

7. [Zeronet/React example site](https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-react)

  Get started creating a zeronet site using react. Need to be updated.

8. [Github Awesome Meta List](https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome)

    Just awesome ;)

## Tools & Dev Services

1. [Mavo](/1F6Rt2QNMA6uJTSTZkDNBfXTd3unrtgcdJ/) #official #experimental

     ZeroNet storage plugin for Mavo that allows any web application created for this platform to run in a P2P and decentralized way without any modification. [[ref]](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:113:ZeroNet+backed+for+Mavo)
1. [0git](/0git.bit/)

   Git repositories hosted on ZeroNet
1.  [CodeR](/1CodEr7T9xNXSPcwbsvf5fHTqsixDMwDzL/)

    JSFiddle and CodePen alternative
1. [Git Center](/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/)

    Git Center is a decentralized hosting platform for Git repositories. We provide several collaboration features such as bug tracking for every project, and private and public repositories for free. Join us by creating a new repository. 
1. [Git over ZeroNet](/1xxooZ7s8iDz3u56i5mNQ1XGmwF8Zvnw9/)
1. [Static git repository page generator](/stagit.0git.bit/)
2.  [NullPaste](/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/) #pastebin
3.  [ZeroDB](/ZeroDB.bit/) #database #WIP

    Visual editor to create Dbschema files.
4.  [ZeroFrame Router](/1K2myjtjoEVpRC2JMieRL73ES4V4iLP2Ev/?/) #vue.js

    A very basic router that works with the ZeroFrame API.

## Devs & Opensource Projects

1.  [HelloZeroNet](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/) #official #python #coffeescript

    [[Gitlab repo]](https://gitlab.com/HelloZeroNet/)

    Repos of all ZeroNet official zites
2.  [AnthyG](https://github.com/AnthyG/)
    *   ThunderWave #chatroom
    *   R_MD_ZN_Blog

        A beautiful Responsive Material-Design Blog for the ZeroNet
1. [Antilibrary.bit-ZeroNet-UI](https://github.com/antilibrary/Antilibrary.bit-ZeroNet-UI) #book-repo

   Front-End source code for the site Antilibrary.bit on ZeroNet
3.  [Kaffiene](https://github.com/April93/Kaffiene)

    ZeroNet search engine
4.  [Kopy Kate](https://github.com/kopy-kate/kopy-kate)

    Online streaming torrents based on WebTorrent and ZeroNet
5.  [Krixano](https://github.com/krixano/) #vue.js
    *   ZeroNet Dev Center
    *   ZeroMedium
    *   ZeroFrame Router
    *   ZeroDB
    *   Important Zites
6.  [mkg2001](https://github.com/mkg20001)
    *   ZeroNetJS #WIP

        A JS version of ZeroNet, using libp2p.
    *   ZeroNet-kivy #official #android #WIP
    *   [mkg20001's Git(Hub) Mirror](/1F7b27kT38nMYZQg7tvDr33qWDZQgwnQpw/)

        a small Git(Hub) mirror, where mirrors the Git projects of some people/organizations
1. [Money-Network](https://github.com/jaros1/Money-Network)

   Demo with complementary and alternative money. Implemented in ZeroNet and AngularJS. Focus on privacy, encryption, max data in client and min data on ZeroNet. Work in progress.
1. [rllola](https://github.com/rllola)
  * zeroTube
  * zeronet-torrent-plugin
  * nanos-zeronet-app #incomplete

   POC application that allow you to create and to sign your ZeroNet website updates using the Ledger Nano S.
7.  [zer0net](https://github.com/zer0net)
    *   ZeroVoat #reddit-like
    *   IFS

        Intergalactic File Server
11.  [ZeroGreeter](/presto.greeter.bit/) #vue.js

    ZeroHello alternative (source code and readme in the zite folder)
8.  [ZeroNerds](https://github.com/ZeroNerds)
    *   ZeroMeReloaded

        Enhanced ZeroMe
    *   HelloZeroProxy

        Enhanced ZeroHello for clearnet proxy
9.  [ZeroMusic](https://github.com/Emeraude/ZeroMusic) #basic #coffeescript
1. [ZeroNetLabs](https://github.com/ZeroNetLabs)
    * ZeroWiki
    * kopi

       Kopi is a ZeroNet boilerplate with all the necessary elements to start a new project without the need to configure and develop the same features again and again.
1.  [Zirch](https://gitlab.com/liberit/zirch) #search-engine
10.  [ZeroMux](https://github.com/MuxZeroNet/ZeroMux)

    Real time video transmuxing and streaming library designed for ZeroNet (Probably deprecated in favor of official big file support).


## Dev Blogs
1. [ekaterina@blog](/1Kp5xdjQyrPth5mEJsn6NDBKZxcaeYz86N/)
  * ZeroDart #WIP

   ZeroNet support for Google's Dart programming language
  * ZeroQuotes
  * ZeroTodes
  * ZeroPolls
